name: EBS Volume
description: Block storage volumes for EC2 instances

availability_zone.label: Availability Zone
availability_zone.description: The AZ where the EBS volume will be created

size.label: Size (GB)
size.description: The size of the volume in gigabytes

iops.label: IOPS
iops.description: The amount of IOPS to provision for the disk (only for gp3, io1, io2)

throughput.label: Throughput (MB/s)
throughput.description: The throughput to provision for gp3 volumes

kms_key_id.label: KMS Key ID
kms_key_id.description: The ARN of the AWS Key Management Service key (optional)

snapshot_id.label: Snapshot ID
snapshot_id.description: A snapshot to base the volume on (optional)
